Style Guide

October 21, 2016 — 00:00

Default Markdown/Kramdown

If your markdown/kramdown isn’t working, do not despare! You probably have to add some line spacing [enter] between elements.


H1 header


H2 header


H3 header


H4 header


H5 header


H6 header



This is emphasized, this too!

This is strong, this too!



A link to the homepage.

A link to the kramdown hp.

A link to a new tab.



This is a text with a footnote1.



term
definition
another definition



  • A list item with additional text
  • another one
  • check it out though!
  1. Item one
    1. sub item one
    2. sub item two
    3. sub item three

This is red.



A sample blockquote.

Nested blockquotes are also possible.

Headers work too

This is the outer quote again.



This is also a code block.

Ending lines must have at least as many tildes as the starting line.

Header1 Header2 Header3
cell1 cell2 cell3
cell4 cell5 cell6
cell1 cell2 cell3
cell4 cell5 cell6
Foot1 Foot2 Foot3


  1. And here is the definition. ↩
